DataElement.preferredName: Intravenous Route of Administration Contrast Agent Injection System Device Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The type of device used to inject an intravenous contrast agent.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Procedure Agents Domain Intravenous Route of Administration Contrast Agent Injection System Device
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to agents used as part of a procedure._Administration within or into a vein or veins._Substances administered during imaging procedures that allows delineation of internal structures. Contrast agents appear opaque due to the difference in absorption of X-rays or other electromagnetic waves and surrounding tissue._A system designed to pump a gas or liquid into a space or environment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to agents used as part of a procedure.

Concepts.definition: A domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to agents used as part of a procedure.

Property.preferredName: Intravenous Route of Administration Contrast Agent Injection System Device
Property.preferredDefinition: Administration within or into a vein or veins.:Substances administered during imaging procedures that allows delineation of internal structures. Contrast agents appear opaque due to the difference in absorption of X-rays or other electromagnetic waves and surrounding tissue.:A system designed to pump a gas or liquid into a space or environment.

Concepts.definition: Administration of a drug within or into a vein or veins. Introduction of the drug directly into venous circulation results in 100% bioavailability due to an absence of the absorption phase, provides a precise and continuous mode of drug therapy, especially for drugs with a narrow therapeutic index.

Substances administered during imaging procedures that allows delineation of internal structures. Contrast agents appear opaque due to the difference in absorption of X-rays or other electromagnetic waves and surrounding tissue.
A system designed to pump a gas or liquid into a space or environment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Substances administered during imaging procedures that allows delineation of internal structures. Contrast agents appear opaque due to the difference in absorption of X-rays or other electromagnetic waves and surrounding tissue._A system designed to pump a gas or liquid into a space or environment._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A pump system with two enclosed reservoirs, designed to deliver various concentrations of intravenous contrast media.

Concepts.definition: A pump system with two enclosed reservoirs, designed to deliver various concentrations of intravenous contrast media.

PermissibleValues.value: Dual chamber power injector with saline flush
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Dual Chamber Power Injector With Saline Flush

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Dual Chamber Power Injector With Saline Flush
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A pump system with two enclosed reservoirs, designed to deliver various concentrations of intravenous contrast media.: Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.: A saline solution used to force an agent from tubing and peripheral veins into the central blood volume.

Concepts.definition: A pump system with two enclosed reservoirs, designed to deliver various concentrations of intravenous contrast media.
Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.
A saline solution used to force an agent from tubing and peripheral veins into the central blood volume.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A pump system with one enclosed reservoir, designed to deliver intravenous contrast agent.

Concepts.definition: A pump system with one enclosed reservoir, designed to deliver intravenous contrast agent.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
